description: Um programa bem completo e fácil de usar (na minha opnião)
Neat app for project management. Needs more love from developers.
conheco o programa, mas nao foi possivel utiliza-lo

Took a little to figure it out, but it works pretty well, and i woudl absolutely recommend it for anyone who needs to, or likes to plan out there day. This is really a good solution if you either have a ticket system that's not managed well, or you have no ticket system to manange your own notes. Highly recommend.. 

I give it 4 out of 5 as i don't see a way to add custom fields, if you could this would easily be a 5 star app.
I'm constantly shifting towards like and dislike. Rich of functionality, but a bit too buggy IMO. Or either cumbersome, makes no difference.

Not quite what I needed now, but for those who are looking for an open source "Project", you should give it a try, definetly.
Good, clean and nice presentation from Qt
summary: Nice work, clean and deserve a try

description: J'aimais bien les fonctionnalités, même si c'était un peu trop complexe pour mon besoin. pour autant, le logiciel n'est pas stable sur mon fedora 30. L'enregistrement des fichiers ne se fait pas...etc.

pas de multi-projets.

ressemble plus à une interface de ToDo list

acune documentation / tutoriel rapide et claire
une interface tres tre peut intuitive

en brefdifficile d'apréheder ce logiciel

summary: Les liens entre tâches ne peuvent être affichés

description: no hands-on book for help. it's diff to show schedule.
